Html:
Hi,

Does Prism 4 provide out of box functionality to dynamically load modules ? and if it does then plz guide how ?

 

Thanks,

Shah

Hi Shah,

I do not know what is your exactly scenario for “dynamically” module loading, but Prism supports module loading in different way:

  • For module loading on demand you could take a look at here.
  • For other ways, you can also check the modularity Quickstart.

Additionally, it is important to know that there is no possibility to unload/reload them.
If you are looking for a solution for adding/removing views in a region from different modules, you could use UI Composition, for further information take look to this:

  • Loading and unloading modules on demand.

Please let me know if this helps.

Fernando Antivero
